objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: This can be done offline after the data has been collected.
objects.name: Analyze organizational skillsets and deficiencies
objects.description: Analyze strengths and weaknesses of the target for potential areas of where to focus compromise efforts. (Citation: FakeLinkedIn)
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Job postings and hiring requisitions have to be made public for contractors and many times have the name of the organization being supported.  In addition, they outline the skills needed to do a particular job, which can provide insight into the technical structure and organization of a target.

external_references.description: LIFARS. (2015, October 8). Hackers Fake LinkedIn Profiles to Scout Targets. Retrieved March 5, 2017.
